00031 ImageManager::ImageManager(QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00032 {
00033     setModal(true);
00034     qDebug()<<isModal();
00035 
00036     setupUi(this);
00037 
00038     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00039     settings.beginGroup("app");
00040     loadThemeIcons(settings.value("theme").toString());
00041     settings.endGroup();
00042 
00043     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00044     connect(tableImage, SIGNAL(customContextMenuRequested(const QPoint &)), this, SLOT(tableImage_showContextMenu(const QPoint &)));
00045     connect(tableImage, SIGNAL(clicked(const QModelIndex &)), this, SLOT(update_lblPathInfo(const QModelIndex &)));
00046 
00047     getCDImages();
00048 
00049     return;
00050 }

00052 void ImageManager::update_lblPathInfo(const QModelIndex){
00053 
00054     if (tableImage->currentRow()<0)
00055         return;
00056 
00057     QSqlQuery query;
00058 
00059     query.prepare("SELECT path FROM images WHERE name=:name");
00060     query.bindValue(":name", tableImage->item(tableImage->currentRow(), 0)->text());
00061 
00062     query.exec();
00063     query.first();
00064 
00065     lblPathInfo->setText(tr("%1").arg(query.value(0).toString()));
00066 
00067     return;
00068 }

00070 void ImageManager::tableImage_showContextMenu(const QPoint){
00071     QMenu menu(this);
00072         menu.addAction(actionAdd);
00073         menu.addSeparator();
00074         menu.addAction(actionRefresh);
00075         menu.addSeparator();
00076 
00077         if (tableImage->currentRow()>=0){
00078             actionRemove->setEnabled(TRUE);
00079         } else {
00080             actionRemove->setEnabled(FALSE);
00081         }
00082 
00083         menu.addAction(actionRemove);
00084 
00085 
00086         menu.exec(QCursor::pos());
00087     return;
00088 }

00091 void ImageManager::getCDImages(void){
00092 
00093     QSqlQuery query;
00094 
00095     qint64 size;
00096 
00097     query.exec("SELECT name, path FROM images ORDER BY name");
00098 
00099     int numRows = tableImage->rowCount();
00100     int curRows = 0;
00101 
00102     while (query.next()) {
00103 
00104                         curRows++;
00105 
00106                         if (curRows>numRows){
00107                             tableImage->insertRow (numRows);
00108                             numRows = tableImage->rowCount();
00109                         }
00110 
00111                         QFile file (query.value(1).toString());
00112                         if (file.exists ()){
00113                             size = file.size() / 1024 / 1024;
00114                         } else {
00115                             size = 0;
00116                         }
00117 
00118                         if (tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 0)){
00119                             tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setText(query.value(0).toString());
00120 
00121                             tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 1)->setText(tr("%1 Mb").arg(size));
00122                             if (!file.exists ()){
00123                                 tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setIcon (QIcon(":/data/important.png"));
00124                             } else {
00125                                 tableImage->item(curRows - 1, 0)->setIcon (QIcon());
00126                             }
00127                         } else {
00128                             QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(query.value(0).toString());
00129 
00130                             tableImage->setItem(curRows - 1, 0, newItem);
00131                             if (!file.exists ()){
00132                                 newItem->setIcon ( QIcon(":/data/important.png") );
00133                             } else {
00134                                 newItem->setIcon ( QIcon() );
00135                             }
00136                             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00137                             newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(tr("%1 Mb").arg(size));
00138                             tableImage->setItem(curRows - 1, 1, newItem);
00139                             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00140                         }
00141     }
00142 
00143     numRows = tableImage->rowCount();
00144 
00145     if (numRows > curRows)
00146         for (int i=curRows; i <= numRows; i++)
00147             tableImage->removeRow(curRows);
00148 
00149     tableImage->resizeRowsToContents();
00150     tableImage->resizeColumnsToContents();
00151     tableImage->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00152 
00153     return;
00154 }

00156 void ImageManager::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00157     QPixmap pixmap;
00158 
00159     if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/iso_manager.png").arg(themePath))){
00160         pixmap.load(":data/iso_manager.png");
00161     }
00162 
00163     lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00164 
00165     managerToolBar = new QToolBar(tlbManager);
00166 
00167     actionAdd = managerToolBar->addAction (loadIcon("data/add.png", themePath), tr("Add image"));
00168     connect(actionAdd, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(actionAddImage()));
00169 
00170     actionRemove = managerToolBar->addAction (loadIcon("data/remove.png", themePath), tr("Remove image"));
00171     connect(actionRemove, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(actionRemoveImage()));
00172 
00173     managerToolBar->addSeparator ();
00174 
00175     actionRefresh = managerToolBar->addAction (loadIcon("data/reload.png", themePath), tr("Refresh image list"));
00176     connect(actionRefresh, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(actionRefreshImageList()));
00177 
00178     return;
00179 }

00183     return;

00187 void ImageManager::actionAddImage(){
00188 
00189     bool fexists=FALSE, ok;
00190     QString fileName, newName;
00191 
00192     #ifdef _OS_LINUX_
00193         fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open ISO or NRG Image file"), QDir::homePath(), tr("iso and nrg files (*.iso *.nrg)"));
00194     #endif
00195 
00196     #ifdef _OS_FREEBSD_
00197         fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open ISO Image file"), QDir::homePath(), tr("iso files (*.iso)"));
00198     #endif
00199 
00200     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00201         QSqlQuery query;
00202 
00203         query.prepare("SELECT name FROM images WHERE name=:name");
00204         query.bindValue(":name", fileName.split("/").last());
00205         query.exec();
00206         query.first();
00207 
00208         fexists=query.isValid();
00209         query.clear();
00210 
00211         newName = fileName.split("/").last();
00212 
00213         while (fexists){
00214             newName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems CD iamge already exists."),
00215                                 tr("Sorry. It seems CD image file already exists.<br>Please rename it, or cancel add image operation."), QLineEdit::Normal, fileName.split("/").last() , &ok);
00216 
00217             if (!ok){
00218                 return;
00219             }
00220 
00221             query.prepare("SELECT id FROM images WHERE name=:name");
00222             query.bindValue(":name", newName);
00223             query.exec();
00224             query.first();
00225             fexists=query.isValid();
00226 
00227             query.clear();
00228         }
00229 
00230         query.prepare("INSERT INTO images(name, path) VALUES(:name, :path);");
00231 
00232         QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
00233 
00234         ;
00235 
00236         query.bindValue(":name", newName);
00237         query.bindValue(":path", fileName);
00238 
00239         if (!query.exec()){
00240             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("debug: %1").arg(query.lastError().text()));
00241         }
00242 
00243         query.clear();
00244         actionRefreshImageList();
00245     }
00246 
00247     return;
00248 }
00249 
00250 void ImageManager::actionRemoveImage(){
00251     if (tableImage->currentRow()==-1)
00252         return;
00253 
00254     QSqlQuery query;
00255         query.prepare("DELETE FROM images WHERE name=:name and path=:path");
00256         query.bindValue(":name", tableImage->item(tableImage->currentRow(), 0)->text());
00257         query.bindValue(":path", lblPathInfo->text());
00258         if (!query.exec()){
00259             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("debug: %1").arg(query.lastError().text()));
00260         }
00261 
00262         query.clear();
00263 
00264     actionRefreshImageList();
00265 
00266     return;
00267 }
00268 
00269 void ImageManager::actionRefreshImageList(){
00270     getCDImages();
00271     return;
00272 }

00274 QIcon ImageManager::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00275     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00276     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00277 
00278     QIcon icon;
00279 
00280     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00281         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00282         if (icon.isNull()){
00283             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00284         }
00285     } else {
00286         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00287     }
00288 
00289     return icon;
00290 }
